page.title: 05Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari.
page.content: Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari is a bilingual comprehensive school, one of three situated in the county of Mid Glamorgan. In our school subjects are taught and examinations are written through the medium of Welsh with the exception of some science subjects. All of the school's day to day activities are run through the medium of Welsh e.g physical education and clubs held at dinner times.Pupils must be fluent in Welsh if they wish to attend this school,the same applies for the members of staff. Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari was opened in September 1974,and the catchment area has changed twice since.The present catchment area extends well beyond the area surveyed,including centres such as Bridgend,Maesteg,Tonyrefail, Llantrisant, Church Village,Tonteg, Creigiau and Pentyrch.
